"DAILYDILEMMAS dataset explores LLMs' value prioritization in complex ethical scenarios. 🤖⚖️ #AIethics #MoralAI" 
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2410.02683
The dataset captures 301 human values across five theories 🧠💡 #Psychology #Data
The study highlights LLMs' inconsistent values. 🧠🤖 #AI #Bias
"AI enhances efficiency and accessibility in critical areas like healthcare, finance, and education. 🧑‍⚕️💻 #AIImpact #Efficiency"
"AI models align differently with ethics, GPT-4-turbo favors transparency, Claude-3-haiku prioritizes safety. #AIEthics #EthicalAI"
AI struggles to align with human values in real-world contexts. 🤖💔 #AIEthics #ValueAlignment
